name: Alive Technologies
overview: Alive Technologies Pty. Ltd. develops and manufactures wireless health monitoring systems. It offers heart and activity monitor, a wireless health monitoring system for the screening, diagnosis, and management of chronic diseases, and for consumer health and fitness; and AliveECG software that connects to the heart and activity monitor over a wireless Bluetooth connection that enables to monitor a patient’s ECG, heart rate, activity, and device status, and to record this data for later review. The company also provides oximeter, a wearable medical device, which reads oxygen saturation data from a sensor on the finger or earlobe, and transmits the data through the Bluetooth wireless technolog…
